title: Profile display
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Profile tab

custom_steps_separated.content: User's profile display (top section of the page)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
- 'Your Profile' header
- background color is determined by the favorite team user has selected
- section should contain the logo of user's favorite team
- user's nickname
- user's player level and prestige ranking
- user's total XP, XP bar with current progress
- user's level and how far they are from the next level 
- 'Season Trophies' section

![](index.php?/attachments/get/8698508)

custom_steps_separated.content: Link layout
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The following links should be displayed and clickable:

- "Submit Feedback" (not in App release) https://mlb.az1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_6r71KJ3tWMK4oIt

- Your Friends

- Favorite Team 

- Delay - cached (not in App release)

- Notifications toggle 

- Vibrations toggle 

- How To Play 

- Account 

- More MLB Apps 

- More BetMGM apps

- Privacy Policy

- Do Not Sell My Data

- Terms of Use 

- FAQ

- Log Out 

- the Current Version

custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Profile tab

custom_steps_separated.content: When user tabs on the top section of profile page

title: Season trophies section
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Profile tab

custom_steps_separated.content: Season trophies section display
custom_steps_separated.expected: 3 season trophies/placeholders should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: If the user played Rally in 2020
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* The user has a trophy for the previous year
* Trophies years - 2020, 2021, 2022

![](index.php?/attachments/get/8698511)

custom_steps_separated.content: If the user has 2020 trophy and user clicks on it
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The 2020 trophy modal is displayed. The button should say 'Got it!' 

![](index.php?/attachments/get/8698510)

custom_steps_separated.content: If the user didn't play Rally in 2020
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* The user has no trophy
* Trophies years - 2021, 2022, 2023

![](index.php?/attachments/get/8698512)

custom_steps_separated.content: If user clicks on 2021, 2022 or 2023 trophies
custom_steps_separated.expected: No modal is displayed

title: Favorite Team
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the profile page

custom_steps_separated.content: Original favorite team test case
custom_steps_separated.expected: **link**

custom_steps_separated.content:
User is able to update the favorite team
* click on - icon on the left side of previously selected team
OR
* click on 3 line icon on the right and drag the tem to followed section
custom_steps_separated.expected: Update button is disabled

custom_steps_separated.content:
* Select another team
* Click Update
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* User is brought back to Profile page
* The profile page background is updated and matches the selected favorite team color
* Selected favorite team is displayed in the list below - Favorite Team: ...

custom_steps_separated.content: User is able to add/remove followed teams
custom_steps_separated.expected:
When user goes back to Favorite Team page, updated favorite and followed teams are displayed

![](index.php?/attachments/get/8698515)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/8698516)
**the button should say 'Update'**

title: Notifications
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the Profile tab
custom_expected: Notifications toggle - should either turn blue or grey depending on if you are turning them on or off

custom_steps_separated.content: If user has notification toggle off and user clicks on it
custom_steps_separated.expected: 'Notification are disabled' pop up is displayed. User can enable notifications in setting

custom_steps_separated.content: If user enabled notifications in settings and goes back to Rally
custom_steps_separated.expected: The notification toggle is on

custom_steps_separated.content: User is able to easily turn notifications on and off
If user's notification is on
custom_steps_separated.expected: User receives notifications

custom_steps_separated.content: If user's notification is off
custom_steps_separated.expected: User does not receive notifications

custom_steps_separated.content:
* Turn the notification toggle on
* Exit the app
* Go back to the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: Notification toggle stays on

custom_steps_separated.content:
* Turn the notification toggle off
* Exit the app
* Go back to the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: Notification toggle stays off

title: Vibrations
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the Profile tab

custom_steps_separated.content: User is able to easily turn vibrations on and off
If user's vibrations is on
custom_steps_separated.expected: User receives vibrations

custom_steps_separated.content: If user's vibrations is off
custom_steps_separated.expected: User does not receive vibrations

custom_steps_separated.content:
* Turn the vibrations toggle on
* Exit the app
* Go back to the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: vibrations toggle stays on

custom_steps_separated.content:
* Turn the vibrations toggle off
* Exit the app
* Go back to the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: vibrations toggle stays off

title: More MLB Apps
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Profile page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on More MLB Apps
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to a "MLB" App screen with an array of Apps:
**Latest Release** (sub head)
-- MLB Rally with an "Open" button present (Open
because the user is signed up)
**Apps & Games** (sub head)
-- MLB Rally with an "Open" button present
-- Junior Giants with a "Get" button present
-- RBI Baseball 20 with a $3.99 button present
**iMessage** (sub head)
-- MLB 2016 Sticker Pack with a "Get" button present
**Apple Watch** (sub head)
-- MLB with with an "Open" button present (If user has an Apple Watch)
**Apple TV** (sub head)
--MLB with an "Open" button present (If user has Apple TV)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/8698796)

custom_steps_separated.content: If user has no friends
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Things to display: 

* header 'Your Friends'
* image
* headline 'Now you can compete with friends.'
* copy 'Invite friends to join you in Rally. Compete against them for 1st place during live games.'
* 'Invite Friends' button 

![](index.php?/attachments/get/9359367)

custom_steps_separated.content: If user has friends
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Things to display: 

* header 'Your Friends'
* copy 'Invite your friends to play Rally. Swipe left on a friend to manage your list.'
* amount of friends and person icon
* list of friends 
* friend's cell contains: avatar, nickname, XP Title (rookie, all-star, etc)
* Avatar should be user's favorite team
* 'Invite Friends' button

![](index.php?/attachments/get/9490496)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user has more than one friend, the list should display friends alphabetically (nickname).
When user taps on 'Your Friends'
custom_steps_separated.expected: User sees 'Invite Friend' button

custom_steps_separated.content: When user taps on 'Invite Friends'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
'Join me in MLB Rally' popup is displayed 

![](index.php?/attachments/get/9345856)

custom_steps_separated.content: When user selects the option
custom_steps_separated.expected: The share link is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: If user selects messages option
custom_steps_separated.expected:
When a user opens a share sheet to “Invite Friends”, the pre-filled message should include:
Message: Join me in MLB Rally
Image: Rally logo

![](index.php?/attachments/get/9345858)

custom_steps_separated.content: If user sends an invite
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* User is brought back to 'Friends' tab. 
* The 'Friends' tab looks like its described in Step 1 until user's friend accepts the invitation

custom_steps_separated.content: After user's friend accepts the invitation
custom_steps_separated.expected: Friends are displayed in each other's friends list

title: Removing friends from profile page
custom_expected: If user has friends and wants to remove some

custom_steps_separated.content: On 'Your Friends' page, swipe left on the friend you want to remove
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* Friends's cell will be swiped to the left
* The red square button will be displayed on the right side of the cell
* The red square will contain an 'X' inside of it

![](index.php?/attachments/get/9359368)

custom_steps_separated.content: Clicking on the red square
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Will display the action popup

* header 'Are You Sure?'
* copy 'This friend will no longer appear on your leaderboard. You can always share a link to add them again.'
* 'Cancel' button (gray background)
* 'Remove' button (blue background)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/9359369)

custom_steps_separated.content: If user taps Cancel
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is brought up to 'Your Friends' page

custom_steps_separated.content: If user taps Remove
custom_steps_separated.expected: Selected friend is removed from user's friends list

custom_steps_separated.content: Deleted friend does not get notified
custom_steps_separated.expected: Both users do not appear in each others friend's lists.

custom_steps_separated.content: When user navigates to 'Your Friend Code' page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Things to display:

* Header 'Your Friend Code'
* copy 'Share this code with a friend for them to add you to their list.'
* user's unique code (in yellow)
* copy 'Enter a friend’s code below to add that friend to your list.'
* 'XXX XXX'
* divider line
* inactive 'Add a Friend' button

![](index.php?/attachments/get/9684567)

custom_steps_separated.content: When user enters 6 digit code
custom_steps_separated.expected: Button gets active and turns blue

custom_steps_separated.content: Code requirements
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* should be 6 digit long
* should only alphanumeric
* should be all caps

custom_steps_separated.content: Tapping and holding user's code
custom_steps_separated.expected: the copy functionality pops up

custom_steps_separated.content: User is able to copy and paste the code
User can paste the code in the friend's code field. Tapping and holding the friends's code field
custom_steps_separated.expected: the pastye functionality pops up

custom_steps_separated.content: When user pastes the code
custom_steps_separated.expected: code is displayed fully

custom_steps_separated.content: If user types in 6 digit code and deletes one digit
custom_steps_separated.expected: The error message 'Please enter a 6-digit token' appears (in red) and divider line turns red as well.

custom_steps_separated.content: If user types in correct code
custom_steps_separated.expected:
After user taps 'Add a Friend' button, the message 'Success! $friendname$ added (in green)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/9684569)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHen user goes to 'Your Friends' list
custom_steps_separated.expected: Newly added friend should be displayed there

custom_steps_separated.content: If user types in invalid code
custom_steps_separated.expected:
After the user taps 'Add a Friend' button, the error message appears 'Invalid code. Please try again' (in red)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/9684568)
